mapper.select:
SELECT LH.HST_ID PK_COL, DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY LH.CRT_DT || LH.HST_ID DESC) RNUM, LH.HST_ID, TO_CHAR(LH.CRT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRT_DT, LH.CRTR, LH.IP, LH.ACT, E.F_NM, E.L_NM FROM (SELECT * FROM LGN_HST
WHERE CRTR = #{crtr} ) LH JOIN (SELECT E.* , E.L_NM || E.F_NM NM FROM EMP E) E ON E.EMP_ID = LH.CRTR
WHERE E.NM LIKE '%' || #{emp.fNm} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LGN_HST (HST_ID, CRT_DT, CRTR, IP, ACT) VALUES ('LH-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_LGN_HST_PK.NEXTVAL,5,'0'), SYSDATE, #{crtr}, #{ip}, #{act})
